verses.verse: In the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> month, in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

Speak, <S%H1696><s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8577>dragon<s%> that <S%H7257>lieth<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of his <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> hath <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H2975>river<s%> is mine own, and <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H6213>made<s%> it for myself.

But I will <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2397>hooks<s%> in thy <S%H3895>jaws,<s%> and I will cause the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of thy <S%H2975>rivers<s%> to <S%H1692>stick<s%> unto thy <S%H7193>scales,<s%> and I will bring thee <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of thy <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of thy <S%H2975>rivers<s%> shall <S%H1692>stick<s%> unto thy <S%H7193>scales.<s%>

And I will <S%H5203>leave<s%> thee thrown into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> thee and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of thy <S%H2975>rivers:<s%> thou shalt <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>fields;<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> be brought <S%H622>together,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6908>gathered:<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> thee for <S%H402>meat<s%> to the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>field<s%> and to the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> they have <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H4938>staff<s%> of <S%H7070>reed<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

When they took <S%H8610>hold<s%> of thee by thy <S%H3709>hand,<s%> thou didst <S%H7533>break,<s%> and <S%H1234>rend<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3802>shoulder:<s%> and when they <S%H8172>leaned<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, thou didst <S%H7665>broke,<s%> and madest <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4975>loins<s%> to be at a <S%H5976>stand.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> thee.

And the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%> and <S%H2723>waste;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> he hath <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H2975>river<s%> is mine, and <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H6213>made<s%> it.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> thee, and <S%H413>against<s%> thy <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> utterly <S%H2723>waste<s%> <S%H2721><s%> and <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> from the <S%H4480>tower<s%> <S%H4024><s%> of <S%H5482>Syene<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia.<s%>

No <S%H3808><s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> through it, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%> of <S%H929>beast<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> through it, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall it be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>countries<s%> that are <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> and her <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are laid <S%H2717>waste<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> and I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and will <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them through the <S%H776>countries.<s%>

Yet <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> At the <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7093><s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they were scattered: <S%H6327><s%>

And I will bring <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and will cause them to <S%H7725>return<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6624>Pathros,<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H4351>habitation;<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H8217>base<s%> <S%H4467>kingdom.<s%>

It shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H8217>basest<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall it exalt <S%H5375>itself<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H1471>nations:<s%> for I will <S%H4591>diminish<s%> them, that they shall no <S%H1115>more<s%> <S%H7287>rule<s%> over the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> the <S%H4009>confidence<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which bringeth their iniquity to <S%H2142>remembrance,<s%> <S%H5771><s%> when they shall <S%H6437>look<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them: but they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H7651>seven<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> month, in the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H853>caused<s%> his <S%H2428>army<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5656>service<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H6865>Tyrus:<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> was made <S%H7139>bald,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> was <S%H4803>peeled:<s%> yet <S%H1961>had<s%> he <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7939>wages,<s%> nor his <S%H2428>army,<s%> for <S%H4480>Tyrus,<s%> <S%H6865><s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it:

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> and he shall <S%H5375>take<s%> her <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> and <S%H7997>take<s%> her <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> and <S%H962>take<s%> her <S%H957>prey;<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H7939>wages<s%> for his <S%H2428>army.<s%>

I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for his <S%H6468>labor<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> he <S%H5647>served<s%> against it, <S%H834>because<s%> they <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> will I cause the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to bud <S%H6779>forth,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee the <S%H6610>opening<s%> of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
